title: As the resident Xin Zhao expert
body:
Lul jk I'm a scrub, but in all seriousness, here are some things to consider:

Bork is in a good spot for xin, more so than it used to be. Enough to be a core item.

The tank item changes provide a little less hp for a bit more resists. This is good for xin because lifesteal scales better with resists than raw hp. As each point of hp recovered is "tankier" than it otherwise would be with less resistances.

With Xin being a really strong initiator, GA having extra AD at the cost of resistances is a net gain, and while GA is situational on Xin, it makes it much more viable than previous.

Xin is at a tipping point right now. He isn't that great, but there are a lot of changes that will directly improve his ability to do what he does best.

With the tank item patch I think Xin will become meta again. Not super OP, but at least more viable. We don't want a sated guinsoo insanity again (I do, but most people don't, because lets face it, it was really broken)
